DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to evaluate the pharmacodynamic profile (blood glucose and urinary glucose excursion) of ASP1941 in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus. Safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics are also evaluated.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of ASP1941 in Japanese Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetic patients for at least 12 weeks HbA1c value between 7.0 and 10.0% at screening Fasting plasma glucose ≥ 126mg/dL and < 240mg/dL at screening Body Mass Index (BMI) 20.0 45.0 kg/m2. Type 1 diabetes mellitus patients Serum creatinine > upper limit of normal Proteinuria（albumin/creatinine ratio > 300mg/g） Dysuria and/or urinary tract infection Significant renal, hepatic or cardiovascular diseases Severe gastrointestinal diseases
